verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Precious Lord take my hand
Lead me on help me stand
Linger on linger near
Precious Lord take my hand

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are closer than the air I breathe
And You teach me who I am
And I want You to be my everything
Lord I need a place to stand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the morning when I come to You
You are there to take my hand
And Your promises they all come true
And Your grace is where I am
